text: Level Up Project! () is a series of Korean variety show featuring South Korean girl group Red Velvet. Currently, it spans over three different seasons and one spin-off. ==Synopsis== Members visit different parts of the world in- between promotions. The first season takes place in Bangkok, the second in Yeosu and the third in Slovenia. The first spinoff, Level Up Thrilling Project, takes place in Seoul. ==Cast== * 1st season: Irene, Seulgi, Wendy and Yeri * 2nd season: Irene, Seulgi, Wendy, Joy and Yeri * 3rd season: Irene, Seulgi, Wendy, Joy and Yeri * Spin-off 1: Irene and Seulgi ==Episodes== ==Broadcasting platforms== ===Korea=== * Oksusu (Season 1-3) * KBS Joy (Season 1) * XtvN (Season 2) * JTBC4 (Season 3) * Wavve and SM C&C; Youtube (I&S;) ===Thailand=== * True ID ==Notes== ==References== Category:Television series based on singers and musicians Category:Red Velvet (group) Category:Television series by SM C&C; Category:XtvN original programming
title: Level Up Project!
